message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.CE, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses the use of causal models to improve RL agents, which falls under the category of AI. The methods proposed involve training the agent to design and execute interventions to discover the true causal model, which relates to the sub-category of machine learning (LG) and robotics (RO). The paper also discusses the difficulty of spurious correlations in causal models, which relates to the sub-category of computer vision and pattern recognition (CE). Finally, the paper proposes a method for improving the causal graph, which relates to the sub-category of systems and control (SY).
